title: Pâté en waffle
description: You will need to make the pickled onions 4 days in advance and soak your raisins the night before, but once that's done everything else is quickly cooked. For this recipe you will need a waffle maker and a blender.
ingredients: pinch coriander seeds and fennel seeds
200g/7oz golden raisins, soaked overnight in cold water
500g/1lb 2oz chicken livers, cut into large pieces
1 sprig thyme, leaves picked and lightly chopped
1 sprig rosemary, leaves picked and finely chopped
